ThingDef.label: super compacted adamantium(Grimworld)
ThingDef.description: A pillar largely consisting of adamantium that was buried deep undergound. These resources were compacted and brought to the surface by a superhero.

ThingDef.label: super compacted auramite(Grimworld)
ThingDef.description: A pillar consisting of auramite that was buried deep undergound, encased in large amounts of useless stone. These resources were compacted and brought to the surface by a superhero.

ThingDef.label: super compacted ceramite(Grimworld)
ThingDef.description: A pillar largely consisting of ceramite that was buried deep undergound. These resources were compacted and brought to the surface by a superhero.

AbilityDef.label: summon adamantium(Grimworld)
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of adamantium(Grimworld variant) at a location.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon auramite(Grimworld)
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of auramite(Grimworld variant) at a location.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

AbilityDef.label: summon ceramite(Grimworld)
AbilityDef.description: Summons a pillar of ceramite(Grimworld variant) at a location.\n\nWARNING: Using this on a location with a plant will destroy said plant. This is as expected.

GeneDef.label: summon adamantium(Grimworld)
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summons a pillar of adamantium(Grimworld variant) at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.

GeneDef.label: summon auramite(Grimworld)
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summons a pillar of auramite(Grimworld variant) at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get some of the resource, though due to how rare it is, this pillar mostly consists of useless stone.

GeneDef.label: summon ceramite(Grimworld)
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can summons a pillar of ceramite(Grimworld variant) at a location once per quadrum. This pillar can be mined to get a lot of the resource.
